title: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
description: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
OB: The 'Go Into' action in the Navigator View is not working as expected.
EB: When a project is closed, the history should be cleared or a message indicating that the project is closed should be displayed in the Navigator View. Additionally, opening another project and selecting a folder should only enable the 'Go Into' action if there is valid content to navigate into.
SR: Fix the 'Go Into' action in the Navigator View to behave properly when projects are closed and when selecting folders in different projects.
